channel.title: Walmart on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Walmart on My New Hugo Site

item.title: When Tech Hit Retail
item.description: [whitebox] [big]Today in Tedium: If it feels like the the “robots are trying to steal our jobs” meme is a new development, I have some news for you: It’s really not. For decades, automation has been implied to be the cause of—and solution to—all life’s problems. Nowhere is this more the case than in the halls of retail, where automation helped redefine our interaction with shopping in important ways. And those innovations are still happening.
